snippet: Former President Bill Clinton said he had come to believe the 1996 law is unconstitutional and contravenes the quintessential American values of “freedom, equality and justice above all.”
abstract: Former President Bill Clinton said he had come to believe the 1996 law is unconstitutional and contravenes the quintessential American values of “freedom, equality and justice above all.”

headline.main: Clinton Urges Court to Overturn Marriage Law He Signed

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
